failed_criteria: Door handles may display approved signage; visible grime automatically disqualifies but fingerprints and minor smudges are acceptable.
action_plan: Clean door handle to remove visible grime and rust before resubmitting the photo.
visual_feedback: Rust and grime visible on the left door handle plate and knob area (lower left of the image).

failed_criteria: Glass on doors is free of heavy dirt or debris; minor reflections or cash4you related promotional signage are acceptable.
safety, legal compliance, or accessibility stickers/signage (such as “Automatic Caution Door” or ADA decals) are permitted on the door; tape residue is acceptable if it does not impede visibility.
action_plan: Remove all heavy dirt, debris, and tape residue from the door glass to restore clear visibility.
Ensure that any remaining residue does not cover or obstruct any part of the glass.
visual_feedback: Heavy dirt and tape residue visible on the center and right side of the door glass.
White adhesive residue obstructs the view through the door glass.

failed_criteria: Hours-of-operation sign must be present but may be slightly skewed or off-center if securely affixed.
action_plan: Ensure the hours-of-operation sign is clearly visible and not covered by promotional signage; reposition or trim promotional sticker so that hours are readable.
visual_feedback: Promotional sign covers the area where the hours-of-operation sign should be visible, making it unreadable.

failed_criteria: Door handles may display approved signage; visible grime automatically disqualifies but fingerprints and minor smudges are acceptable.
action_plan: Clean or replace the door handle to remove visible grime and corrosion.
visual_feedback: Visible heavy rust and grime on the left-side exterior door handle.

failed_criteria: Door handles may display approved signage; visible grime automatically disqualifies but fingerprints and minor smudges are acceptable.
action_plan: Clean or replace the door handles to remove visible grime and rust to meet cleanliness standards.
visual_feedback: Significant rust and grime visible on the right door handle at mid-height of the door.
